Detailed Description

Define Documentation

#define QUEUE_CLASS_IMPL ( ns   ) 

Value:

ns::ctk_queue_ea_t m_q; \
    public: \ \
        Queue(int capacity = 127) : m_q(0) { \
            int ret = ns::_ctk_queue_create(&m_q, capacity); \
            if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS) \
                throw Error(ret); \
            alloc(); \
        } \ \
        Queue(const Queue &queue) : m_q(queue.m_q) { \
            copy(&queue); \
        } \ \
        Queue &operator=(const Queue &queue) { \
            assign(&queue); \
            m_q = queue.m_q; \
            return *this; \
        } \
        virtual ~Queue() { release(); } \
        /* implement */ \
        virtual void destroy() { \
            if (m_q != 0) ns::_ctk_queue_destroy(m_q); \
        }

#define QUEUE_CLASS_IMPL_COMMON ( ns   ) 

Value:

public:     \
        void enq(T item) { \
            ns::_ctk_queue_enq(m_q,  \
                *reinterpret_cast<ns::ctk_queue_item_t*>(&item)); \
        } \
        int tryenq(T item) { \
            return ns::_ctk_queue_tryenq(m_q,  \
                *reinterpret_cast<ns::ctk_queue_item_t*>(&item)); \
        } \
        T deq() { \
            T item; \
            ns::_ctk_queue_deq(m_q,  \
                reinterpret_cast<ns::ctk_queue_item_t*>(&item)); \
            return item; \
        } \
        int trydeq(T &item) { \
            return ns::_ctk_queue_trydeq(m_q,  \
                reinterpret_cast<ns::ctk_queue_item_t*>(&item)); \
        } \
        int peek(T &item) { \
            return ns::_ctk_queue_peek(m_q, \
                reinterpret_cast<ns::ctk_queue_item_t*>(&item)); \
        } \
        virtual operator void*() { return (void*)(unsigned long)m_q; } \
        virtual operator ea_addr_t () { return m_q; } \
        size_t size() { return ns::_ctk_queue_get_capacity(m_q); } \
        size_t count() { return ns::_ctk_queue_get_remaining_count(m_q); }
